content:
"Are you on the fence about attending our upcoming workshop? We understand that making a decision to invest in yourself and your career can be difficult. That's why we want to address any concerns you may have and help you make an informed decision. Here are some frequently asked questions to help guide you:

Q: Who is this workshop for?
A: This workshop is for healthcare professionals who want to elevate their coding skills, stay current with the latest guidelines, and take control of their career.

Q: What topics will be covered in the workshop?
A: We will cover the introduction of 2023 guidelines, history of E/M MDM table, hands-on practice, and much more.

Q: Will there be any hands-on practice?
A: Yes, the workshop will include practical examples and case studies to help you apply what you've learned.

Q: How long is the workshop?
A: The workshop is 2 days long

Don't miss out on this opportunity to invest in yourself and your career. Register now and join us on this journey to coding success! #EandM #Coding #FAQ"
